name: Chrono Streets
description:
Chrono Streets is a very unusual kind of infinite runner driving game - Time slows down with you. Use the best of your skills to find the best path, move around obstacles and destroy enemies in a crazed city.

•   •   •

Chrono Streets is a game made in just 48 hours for the Game Jam Pacífico, where it won the award for Most Innovative. Using the Unity Engine, our team of just two friends have created a playable prototype of our idea, which we believe is a truly addictive and challenging game.

This game prototype is free to download and play. Try it out, test it, and tell us what you think.

Our Team:

  • Daniel Somarribas - @KeyTryer
  • Fabián Balmaceda - From Lápiz Oriental
